summary: TRUMPS MUGSHOT - Imagine a world without Trump’s tweets ​lighting up our feeds or his outlandish ​antics sparking endless debates. Boring, ​right? Keeping Trump free is like keeping ​the lead character in the wildest reality ​show ever. So, for the sheer ​entertainment and the daily dose of “Did ​he really just say that?”—let’s skip the ​jail. Trump on the loose keeps the world ​on its toes!
